attributes.action: Look into the possibility of making Kate Bush a Dame of the British Empire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kate Bush has been a leading musician since her debut in 1978. She has been an instrumental leader and influencer of music in this country. She keeps herslef to herself and doesnt leaad the typical celebrity lifestyle. She has aso promoted the bulgarian music in her albums and has introduced a generation of fans to new music. A worthy Dame!!!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
